LanguageData.Kurin_OnSkin_Shirt.description: It is a little larger shirt with a collar and buttons. It's great to wear at any time unless it's very hot.
LanguageData.Kurin_OnSkin_T_Shirt.description: It is a nice t-shirt to wear in hot summer.
LanguageData.Kurin_OnSkin_Hot_Pants.description: It is light hot pants. Sunscreen is essential to avoid burning skin on sunny days.
LanguageData.Kurin_OnSkin_Pajamas.description: It is very comfortable pajamas. It also guarantees a good night's sleep, even for those who suffer from insomnia..
LanguageData.Kurin_OnSkin_One_Piece_Dress.description: It is a moderately light dress. It looks very innocent!
LanguageData.Kurin_OnSkin_Open_Back_Knit.description: The cut is largely dug on one side. There is still some debate among the Kurins how to wear it.
LanguageData.Kurin_OnSkin_Open_Shoulder_Knit.descript: It is a cute open shoulder knit. It's very comfortable and soft so you can actually fall asleep.
LanguageData.Kurin_OnSkin_Hoodie.description: This is a large size hoodie that is easy to get active.
LanguageData.Kurin_OnSkin_Casual_Wear.description: It is a popular casual wear for Kurin. Never missed both comfort and style.
LanguageData.Kurin_OnSkin_Armored_Gothic_Dress.descri: It is a costume made by padding a plate in Gothic dress. it doesn't give up defensive capability while keeping the charming style of the dress. .
LanguageData.Kurin_OnSkin_Gothic_Dress.description: Gothic dress. Looks old-fashioned anytime, anywhere.
LanguageData.Kurin_OnSkin_Bikini_Armor.description: Even though a lot went into it, it appears weak and exposed . However, despite its vulnerable appearance, it is actually very strong and significantly increases the wearer's melee combat.
LanguageData.Kurin_OnSkin_Military_Uniform.descriptio: Combat military uniform with plaque bulletproof plates. Light and warm, it ensures a good amount of defense. Its ergonomic design also significantly increases the wearer's ranged combat power.
LanguageData.Kurin_OnSkin_Nun_Dress.description: It is an exceptional design of nuns.
LanguageData.Kurin_OnSkin_Work_Jumpsuit.description: It is the uniform of the technician working in the red fox armory. Not only are there pockets for storing various tools and parts, but they are made of a material that is not damaged or contaminated with oil or sparks.
LanguageData.Kurin_OnSkin_Traditional_Simple_Dress.de: Pure white skirts and pink shirts are impressive Kurin costumes.
LanguageData.Kurin_OnSkin_Traditional_Fancy_Dress.des: A gorgeous blue skirt and a white shirt with a point are impressive Kurin costumes.
LanguageData.Kurin_OnSkin_Traditional_Luxury_Dress.de: Kurin's traditional costume features a brown see-through skirt and shirt.
LanguageData.Kurin_OnSkin_Cute_Dress.description: It is a very cute dress. Kurin often wear it for festivals.
LanguageData.Kurin_OnSkin_Seductive_White_Dress.descr: It is a very seductive white dress with one skirt open.
LanguageData.Kurin_OnSkin_Seductive_Black_Dress.descr: It is a very seductive black dress with one skirt open.
